title: Stox
description: Stox is a web app that you can use to trade fake stocks. It uses the IEX cloud API to fetch real time stock data and features form validation for sign up.

title: Slone Heating & Air
description: Slone Heating & Air is a brochure site for a HVAC company in Lexington KY.

title: Calculator
description: A simple javascript calculator built using React.

title: Pomodoro Timer
description: A functional Pomodoro timer built using React you can use to split up your working day between work blocks and rest blocks
